message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I think 55-45 is a fair split, considering the money's value will decrease for me in the next rounds.
The value is decreasing for you, Bob, so let's be reasonable. I'll take $55, and you get $45. It's better than what you offered last round!
The value is decreasing for me, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half. 51-49 is my final offer.
